title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, comfortable, and well-fitting, with one noting it's long enough for tall women. They appreciate its lightweight nature, making it suitable for warm fall days, and describe it as incredibly soft and well-made. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some love the material, others find it terrible and not 100% cotton. The fabric thickness is also mixed, with some finding it

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful and Stylish Sweater
items.body: I really like this sweater, it’s very stylish and versatile. The sweater can be worn three different ways on the shoulders, off both shoulders or off one shoulder. Excellent quality in the material and structure of the sweater. The weight of the sweater is great, this sweater can be worn all year round. Not too heavy for spring and summer and not too light for fall and winter. Great fit and price. I definitely recommend this sweater. Read more
items.author: Philly Girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great find
items.body: Great fit. I sized up for a baggier look. I got the xl and I weight 176lb and am 5'4" for those curious. For a not as loose fit definitely get the large if you are around my size. Its soft and comfortable on the inside like a light fleece and yes the stars are like iron ons but thick. I would just suggest turning it inside out to wash and letting it hang dry or put it on air dry in the dryer. Will be buying more in different colors! I got it in the the blue color. The only con is it does have a vinegar smell to it after opening. Read more
items.author: KB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater to start fall
items.body: Like the fit of this although it does not fit off the shoulder on me. That is fine because I was not planning on wearing that way. The material is nice quality and not too heavy. Not heavyweight but comfortable. Read more
items.author: Riddles

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute on
items.body: Love how this pullover looks on. I'm 5'3 120 lbs. and ordered the small. Fits great. I also have the red and blue sweaters also. Read more
items.author: Sheri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy and true to size!
items.body: Absolutely love the shirt! Fits true to size. Very very comfortable! Good quality! Read more
items.author: maydyn Steffen

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Stars
items.body: I bought the same pullover knit in Heather gray and Black. Stars on the Black pullover are more of a decal and have that "plastic" type feeling to it. The Heather gray stars are more embossed and are not decals. After washing the black pullover, I put it in the dryer with Medium heat and I pulled it out early before the dryer cycle was done. I found that the stars were "stuck" a bit to each other and I had to pull to separate. As you can see on the photo, they are a bit wrinkly. Please use caution. Label only has washing instructions, which I followed, but nothing mentioning about drying. Otherwise, I really like it. Material is lightweight but has a nice thin inter lining that can keep you a little warm on a cool evening. It also has a nice stretch and soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Patti Martin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars great feel
items.body: soft and cute. I wanna get more colors, but need to stop spending so much money lol Read more
items.author: Danielle Costa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfortable
items.body: Light weight. Great sweater for spring or fall . Cute and comfortable Read more
items.author: ChristinaH

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown1, Brown, White, Blue, Apricot, Black, Blue Grey, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
